item.title: Adobe Alternatives
item.description: Alternatives to Adobe Software Below are alternatives to Adobe Software that can be used either online or for download Photoshop - Download GIMP Photoshop - Web Based Photopea Pixlr Remove Illustrator - Web Based VECTR Vectorpea Boxy SVG Gravit Designer Illustrator - Download Inkscape Lightroom - Web Based Fotor Premiere - Web Based Adobe Express Canva Premiere - Download Shotcut In-Design - Download Scribus In-Design - Web Based Canva

item.title: Open / Creative Commons / Free Resources
item.description: Open / Creative Commons / Free Resources Below are curated resources for finding images/graphics that are licensed in a way that allows for remix/reuse. Photographic Images Openverse Pixabay Nappy Images of Empowerment Europeana EDU Images StockSnap Pexels Textures TextureLabs Photoshop Brushes Kyle’s Brushes Brusheezy Clip Art / Vector Art / Line Drawings Open Clip Art Drawkit Undraw Lukaz Adams Open Peeps Humaaans Fonts DaFont Google Fonts Font Fabric – Free Fonts Font Squirrel 1001 Fonts Icons Noun Project Flaticon Simple Icons Ionicons Animaticons Videos Mixkit Videezy Coverr Videvo Life of Vids Audio Freesound Bensound

item.title: Social Media Dimensions
item.description: General Suggestions: Always design square photos to 1080x1080 and shrink them to the appropriate size. Phone sized pictures/videos (instagram story, tiktok video) are 1080x1920. Social Media Instagram Post: 1080x1080 Instagram Story: 1080x1920 TikTok Profile Picture: 200x200 TikTok Video: 1080x1920 Facebook Banner: 820x312 Facebook Profile Picture: 1080x1080 Twitter Profile Picture: 400x400 Gaming Discord Profile Picture: 120x120 Xbox Gamerpic: 1080x1080 Playstation Avatar: 440x440 Steam Pic: 184x184
